amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize an equitable transfer of land and property between Dona Ana County in New Mexico and a private investor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 112-46 to authorize an equitable transfer of land and property, in the form of a road, between Dona Ana County in New Mexico and Verde Corporate Realty Services. Dona Ana County would continue to use the land for airport purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 215 (Roll no. 214).
